data.name: No More Noise
data.detailed_description:
You are the survivor of a post-apocalyptic world in which humanity has turned into the undead. Your objective is to get to point B to retrieve an object that must be brought back to point A.

Enemies

The enemies are very powerful. Each sound made by the player or by an object (a grenade for example) increases the power of the enemies in the area.
Power levels are defined that increase strength, movement speed and life of each enemy.

Objects

The player will be able to use firearms, melee weapons and throwing weapons to defend himself. Traps will be available to trigger sounds in certain areas or to inflict damage on enemies.
Gadgets can be used, such as drones or radio-controlled cars, to help you progress through the different levels.

data.short_description: You are the survivor of a post-apocalyptic world in which humanity has turned into undead. Your objective is to go to point B to retrieve an object that must be brought back to point A. Your enemies are very powerful, so you must use the strategy and tools to accomplish your mission.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 510+, Radeon HD5900+, or Intel HD4000+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Subject to change.
